<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fade Band](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2974)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=629" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 264 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** An attack misses you

**Requirement** You are trained in Stealth
</row>

</column>

---

This thin, silvery wire wraps around your armor. When you activate the band, it casts a 2nd-rank [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell on you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
